name: pnp-list-teams-app-usage
title: List app usage in Microsoft Teams
shortDescription: Iterates through all the teams in your tenant and lists all apps in each team.
longDescription: A sample script which iterates through all the teams in your tenant and lists all apps in each team. This script will be handy if you want to generate a report of available apps in Teams across your tenant.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
